Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which is valued at $120 to me. This product has been meticulously crafted to provide exceptional quality and functionality. Considering its value and benefits, I am offering it to you at a special introductory price of $105. Don't miss out on this opportunity to experience the excellence of our product at an attractive discount. If you're interested, please let me know so we can proceed with the purchase. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $105. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $105
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $150
